messages.body:
Hi Support,

I had a customer (emma.wilson234@example.com) purchase my UX Design Course today, but they immediately requested a refund saying it was an accidental purchase.

I processed the refund right away through Stripe (screenshot attached), but I noticed I was still charged $24.99 in platform fees that weren't refunded.

Could you help me recover these fees since this was an immediate refund?

conversation.subject: Platform Fees Not Refunded After Customer Refund
